General.Name: F&F Co Ltd
General.Description: F&F Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells sewn wearing apparels in South Korea. It offers products under the MLB, MLB KIDS, DISCOVERY, and DISCOVERY KIDS brands. The company was founded in 1972 and is based in Seoul, South Korea. F&F Co., Ltd.(KOSE:A383220) operates independently of F&F Holdings Co., Ltd. as of May 21, 2021.
